title: Terrified
lyrics:
Ah, ah, ah, ah
Ah, ah, ah, ah
Do you drink champagne when you miss me?
To cover up the mess that you are inside
Said you never would but you still hit me

When I hit you back you were terrified



You're getting way too big for your heels

You're not the only one in my life

Motel California for my feels

Took a psycho flip, now I'm terrified



Always want what's best for me

That's my scientology (what?)

I want my m3

(I want, I want my m3)



I'm terrified

To be in love in the night-time

Crying out my eyes by your shrine

I'm terrified

Just by the way that you lose control

Am I immortal, or just a lost soul

Cause' I'm so (I'm so)

I'm so terrified



Ah, ah, ah, ah

Ah, ah, ah, ah



A stained rug on the floor with your blood

Knife in my hand no tears in my eyes

I knew it was hate and it was never love

Still what have I done, fucking terrified



Always want what's best for me

That's my scientology (what?)

I want my m3

(I want, I want my m3)



I'm terrified

To be in love in the night-time

Crying out my eyes by your shrine

I'm terrified

Just by the way that you lose control

Am I immortal, or just a lost soul

Cause' I'm so (I'm so)

I'm so terrified



Ah, ah, ah, ah

I'm terrified

Ah, ah, ah ,ah

I'm terrified

Ah, ah, ah, ah



Still over rubbing my cunt

I'd probably still vote for Trump

I'm terrified of me



I'm terrified

To be in love in the night-time

Crying out my eyes by your shrine

I'm terrified

Just by the way that you lose control

Am I immortal, or just a lost soul

Cause' I'm so (I'm so)

I'm so terrified



Ah, ah, ah, ah

Ah, ah, ah, ah
